title: Inflation rate in Lithuania 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
The line drastically decreased by 4.8 times from Year 2013 to 2014,increased by 2.8 times from Year 2014 to 2015, and lastly, increased by 5.5 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 4.12 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.24 was reached at Year 2014
min_summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
mid_summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 4.12 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.24 was reached at Year 2014
max_summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 4.12 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.24 was reached at Year 2014
The line significantly decreased by 0.92 from Year 2013 to 2014,increased by 0.44 from Year 2014 to 2015, and lastly, increased by 3.04 from Year 2016 to 2017.
